projects.name: TalaPrep
projects.description: An online marketplace that connects students with tutors and leverages video profiles to showcase teaching style, personality and experience.

projects.name: Vote Redux
projects.description: An application that lets groups of users vote on movies currently in theatres in a tournament-style fashion.

projects.name: React Chattr
projects.description: A chat application that supports the standard features found in common chat applications, enabling user avatars, names and message timestamps.

projects.name: Dashboard
projects.description: A user management system that keeps track of user data and supports adding, editing and removing users.

projects.name: TicTacToe+
projects.description: A Google-inspired TicTacToe game, with a built in AI that utilizes the minimax algorithm.

projects.name: Pomodoro
projects.description: A productivity application that helps users track their break and work periods, with adjustable settings for each timer.
